name: analyze_protease_kinetics
description: Analyze protease kinetics data from fluorogenic peptide cleavage assays.

setup_commands: git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni.git /tmp/biomni && cd /tmp/biomni && pip install -e . && rm -rf .git

inputs.name: time_points
inputs.description: Array of time points (in seconds) at which measurements were taken

inputs.name: fluorescence_data
inputs.description: 2D array of fluorescence measurements where each row corresponds to a different substrate concentration

inputs.name: substrate_concentrations
inputs.description: Array of substrate concentrations (in μM) corresponding to each row in fluorescence_data

inputs.name: enzyme_concentration
inputs.description: Concentration of the protease enzyme (in μM)

output.description: Research log summarizing the analysis steps and results
